gcap 0.2.0

Reference

Workflow

Pipeline for implementing end-to-end analysis

gcap.workflow()

GCAP workflow for gene-level amplicon prediction

gcap.ASCNworkflow()

GCAP workflow for gene-level amplicon prediction from ASCN input

Analysis Wrapper

Core build block for constructing pipeline

gcap.runASCAT()

Run ASCAT on tumor-normal pair WES data files

gcap.runBuildflow()

Build data for prediction from ASCAT results

gcap.runPrediction()

Run gene-level amplicon prediction

gcap.runScoring()

Quantify sample-level ecDNA measueres

Individual Analysis Modules

Individual data processing and analysis functions

gcap.extractFeatures()

Extract sample and region level features

gcap.collapse2Genes()

Generate unified gene-level feature data

get_auc()

Get AUC value

Datasets

Builtin datasets

ec

Example ecDNA training data

ascn

Example allele specific copy number (ASCN) data
